intro: Cnemidaria conformis, commonly known as the common sandwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Montiaceae. It is a low-growing perennial herb that typically forms dense mats of foliage. The plant features small, clustered flowers that are usually pink or white in color. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in sandy or gravelly soils. Cnemidaria conformis is well adapted to withstand drought conditions due to its succulent leaves and deep root system.
